Operators and >>

all

all of the elements of a matrix satisfy some condition.

Syntax

R = all(M)
R = all(M, dim)
R = all(M, 'all')

Input argument

M

a matrix.

dim

a integer value: dimension along it works.

'all'

tests over all elements of M.

Output argument

R

a logical matrix.

Description

all returns true if all of the elements of a matrix satisfy some condition.

Example

all([33, 22; 11, 0])
all([33, 22; 11, 0], 2)

See also

any.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
